trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin would have you undertake an important rite.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_TODO_00<tab>Obtain Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Mamizu from the placid priestess in Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_TODO_01<tab>Sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu near the consecrated shell.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_TODO_02<tab>/pray to the consecrated shell.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_TODO_03<tab>Report to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>It is time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As one of the Divine Circle, you must undertake the rite of purification, that you might deepen your bond with the kami of the hunt.

TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>To this end, you will require a special kind of holy water called Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Mamizu. This can be had from a priestess of Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato.

TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Once you have the water, return hither to Tamamizu and present yourself before the consecrated shell yonder. There you must sprinkle the water and offer a prayer to the kami.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SUIWOMAN02981_000_010<tab>Ah, you must be the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of whom the Kojin spoke. I have your water. Take it, and may you find favor with the kami.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_UROKUZU_000_015<tab>Come to undertake the rite, have you? Go ahead and sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu, then say a prayer to the kami.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>You are purified from head to toe. Now you may <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to the consecrated shell.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>This does not appear to be the right spot. Try sprinkling the water again near the consecrated shell.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SUIWOMAN02981_000_025<tab>You have the water. Shouldn't you be heading back to Tamamizu?
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_SYSTEM_100_025<tab>This appears to be the right spot to sprinkle the Sui-no-Mamizu.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_UROKUZU_000_030<tab>Good, good. 'Tis important to give thanks. The kami will surely smile upon your treasure-hunting endeavors.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_UROKUZU_000_031<tab>Though you are not Kojin, you respect our ways as your own. Full glad am I to know a shell-less one such as you.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_UROKUZU_000_035<tab>Purifying yourself is but half of the rite. Now you must pray to the kami.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_ZUKIN_000_040<tab>The rite is complete? That is well. As you know, we Kojin seek out treasure that we might strengthen our bond with the kami.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_ZUKIN_000_041<tab>And by the rite, we entreat he who abides in the shell to facilitate this bond. By honoring him, we may seek with greater success, thereby honoring all.
TEXT_BANKJN303_02981_UROKUZU_000_045<tab>Though you are not Kojin, you respect our ways as your own. Full glad am I to know a shell-less one such as you.
